channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ChatGPT Down Again: Eight Hours And Counting
item.description: OpenAI is suffering from a prolonged outage, which has seen ChatGPT go down for several hours and other services affected.

item.title: Drones Deliver Millions Of Mosquitos to Prevent Bird Extinctions In Hawai‘i
item.description: Mosquito “birth control” delivery efforts mark a major technological advance for conserving critically endangered Hawai’ian honeycreepers.

item.title: A Big New Update About ‘Dept. Q’ Season 2 From Netflix
item.description: Fans looking for information about Dept. Q season 2 may finally have some word from Netflix on the potential renewal.

item.title: Netflix’s Best New Show Lands A 100% Rotten Tomatoes Score From Critics
item.description: The best new show to hit Netflix in a while has arrived with perfect scores from critics, but it may not be for everyone, given its subject matter.

item.title: The Reason There’s No More ‘Starfield’ DLC

item.title: Grab and go
item.description: Every retailer knows that the items that sell the best are at eye level or at the cash register. Some people are hungry, rushed, distracted and lazy. ...

item.title: Ready to be…
item.description: Disappointed Delighted Amazed Offended Ripped off Grateful Loved Sometimes we get what we expect.

item.title: Squeaky wheels

item.title: Uphill and downhill challenges
item.description: There’s a big hill near my house. Sometimes, a bicyclist will really pedal hard on the downhill. It’s good for the ego. It’s also crazy dangerous, sin...

item.title: On burning bridges
